subject: p12185775
History: H/o CKD diabetic nephropathy s/p DDRT in p/w abdominal pain x1d, N/V, CT concerning for R-sided ischemic colitis, code BLUE for respiratory distress, NSTEMI. C/o sob now with increased creatinine, assess for pulmonary edema.
Findings: The ET and NG tubes have been removed. A right PICC line terminates in the low SVC. Calcified left lung nodules are unchanged. The lungs are otherwise clear except for left basilar atelectasis. A small left pleural effusion has developed. Moderate cardiomegaly is unchanged.
Impression: No evidence of pulmonary edema. Increased small left pleural effusion. Stable moderate cardiomegaly.
